descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Discord: discord.gg/hsvr** (horror simulator vr)

**Complete special in-game tasks to win exclusive awards🎁**

                                                                                            
[media]
Horror Simulator is a thrilling co-op horror game that combines survival horror and strategic gameplay. **Features 3 completed maps, 2 game modes, 20+ unique demon types,  50+ supernatural events... game content is continuously updating!** 

# 🏰 Solo/Multiplayer Adventure in Haunted Mansion
[media]
- **Solo or 3-player co-op. Real-time voice chat** allows you to stay in close communication with your teammates, share clues, and devise strategies. 

- **Customize avatar**: Unlock a variety of masks, skins, and decorations. Cosmetics designs are player-driven - join Discord to share your ideas!

# 🕸 Immersive Puzzle-Solving & Exploration
[media]
- **20+ demon types**, each with unique personality and behavior. Every round features a new demon, ensures every playthrough brings fresh challenges.
- Use **7 sacramentals** to to solve challenging puzzles and reveal the demon’s name.
- **3 maps with 50+ unique, fully interactive rooms**. Each exploration may uncover crucial clues or trigger unexpected supernatural events!
- **Take on daily, weekly and in-game tasks** to earn coins and unlock cosmetics and in-game items.


# 🏃 Classic & Crazy Mode　
[media]
- Demons will do everything to scare you off. When your sanity plummets, demons will initiate hunt mode. 
- In Crazy Mode, demons possess special abilities, making teamwork and strategy crucial for victory!
